website_summaries.verdict: Built-in image stabilization and high bitrate recording make this Sony's best Action Cam yet, but there are still a few usability quirks remaining.
pros: High bitrate recording and a bunch of extra features like GPS make this Sony's best Action Cam so far, with good still image and audio quality added to the mix
A new tally light on the top of the camera makes it easy to see when you're recording
cons: The live view remote can't be used for photo or video playback, and a microSDXC card is needed for high bitrate recording
Exposure during regular 28Mbps video recording is uneven, while water tends to cling to the front of the waterproof case

customer_reviews.title: We love this action cam
customer_reviews.text: We love this action cam, and it saved quite a bit over buying a Go Pro. The image quality is great for picture and video. We bought it primarily for a winter family vacation. I was able to take the footage and make movies with credits, music, slo-mo....a lot of cool things that I have no experience in. They came out great and everyone enjoyed watching them. I have also used this underwater and it worked great there as well. I'm not sure how it does biking/surfing etc., but it did work great for snorkeling, sledding, skiing, and normal back-yard type stuff. I would highly recommend this camera to any family.
customer_reviews.author: MattRedna

customer_reviews.title: Terrible clear plastic case cover release mechanism leading to a camera drop to the pavement.
customer_reviews.text: Menu is not very user friendly. Front clear plastic case cover was so difficult to unlatch, that once it unlatched, the action camera slid out and landed onto the pavement...lens first, and so incurred a scratch. Lens cannot be replaced without having to replace the entire camera. I expect image quality will be compromised. I'm bummed out and so this camera is just sitting. Buy another proven brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jung

customer_reviews.title: I recommend using the PNY U3 Turbo Performance 64GB High Speed ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for everything from hiking/cliff diving to motorcycle riding. Captures all my adventures when I need it to. It does have somewhat of a fisheye lens around the edges but the stabilization feature is well worth it compared to other cameras. I recommend using the PNY U3 Turbo Performance 64GB High Speed MicroSDXC with it though. I purchased some different cards first and they didn't work. Once I found this card I stuck with it. It has a fast enough write speed that allows you to use Pro mode and the higher HD modes. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Most affordable action cam on the market with great stabilizer
customer_reviews.text: arrive on time, in very excellent state, purchased this to replace my flooded AS30, love this camera, its better than any others on the market, stability its excellent. The remote can be use but not really necessary cause the screen is way too small and if you are on a bike, cannot take a look all the time. Also the quality is wonderful, the only disadvantage is that you are required to free Sony software to download videos and edit it on the computer. To watch on any Sony TV, a micro-HDMI cable is enough. Purchased cause this is affordable action cam, not like the other square camera that everybody loves.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: While the Go Pro is an amazing camera as well
customer_reviews.text: This camera ROCKS! I spent months comparing this to Go Pro Hero 3+ Black edition. While the Go Pro is an amazing camera as well, there are many other features that this has that go pro does not. The image stabilization is sensational! The High speed setting (480 at 240fps!!!) is crazy!!! The comparison of this camera to GoPro is like an Apple vs Andoid device. When it comes to mounts and such, the market makes everything for GoPro, just like most phone accessories are for Apple. However, buy the Drift Go Pro mount adapter and a go pro mount accessory kit and you are ready to go!! I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: MAGA2020

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for price and aerodynamics
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I watched a lot of reviews before buying it and found out that all of the action cameras don't have strong low light abilities, so anyone would work. For me at least. I also wanted more than one so the price here was in my favour. I tried the gopro on a motorcycle helmet and I felt the air pushing my helmet to the left due to having the gopro camera mounted there. After trying this one, I found out the problem isn't that evident like the gopro. So I bought this one. I'm not dissing the gopro though. I'm neutral here. I strongly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal T AL-Maiman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little action cam.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressed with this action cam. I took it to Peru surfing for 3 weeks. Very high quality video both in and out of the water. While it still has a wide angle lens, it does not seem as fish bowled as the Go Pro. The fact that you can view it on your Smartphone, has interval pictures, and regular pictures is great added features. Small enough that I could keep it in my wetsuit, and then pull it out when I needed it. The only Con I can think of was battery life. If I tried to go more than on than one day, the battery would die. Just got to the point where I recharged it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Bucy

customer_reviews.title: Love these little cameras
customer_reviews.text: Love these little cameras.I have an older model HDR-AS20 and decided to get this model with its upgraded features. Also it's was cheaper now that it has also been updated. What I like most about the HDRAS 100 is that it is weatherproof and can be mounted on a tripod without the under water housing. It also has GPS tracking and better image quality. The camera is very easy to pair with my phone and uses all the same accessories as my older models. This little camera is a great little action cam and I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mencer

customer_reviews.title: The old style with convex plastic does blurred images underwater while perfect above. There is a new style flat plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Major problem with the underwater case. The old style with convex plastic does blurred images underwater while perfect above. There is a new style flat plastic front cover but Sony isn't sending you one for free!
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pictures, great durability, works amazing in all my travels
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pictures, lacks some funtions that where updates later, is anoying the lack of support from sony after just some months after the release, the camera works great tho. I bougth 2 more batteries cause it seems to loose power abruptly.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A. Fontanive

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this action cam
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this action cam. I was heavily considering getting a go pro for about $400, but then I consulted my brother about this decision, and he told me to look at Sony's line of action cams. Sony easily beats go pro in every aspect except for a slight reduction in quality during lighted conditions. Better price, has video stabilization, long battery life, splash proof, comes with a case included so you don't have to buy it separately, you can connect it to an iPhone or many smart phones. Overall, I'm really satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: - Aerodynamic shape - Excellent image quality - High bitrate codec does well even ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Aerodynamic shape - Excellent image quality - High bitrate codec does well even at 60FPS - Analog video out Cons: - Fisheye distortion - Only 2mp photos in time lapse mode - No possibility to set 120 degree FOV without enabling image stabilisation that ruins the image quality. Bought it mainly because of high bitrate XAVC S codec and good price. Using it for areal video on a multicopter @60P with a modified lens since the stock lens is too wide that the distortion is way too much. The image stabilisation does get rid of distortion because the FOV becomes 120 degree but then image quality takes a serious hit. Overall an excellent camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Farrukh

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam
customer_reviews.text: Great action cam. Good video quality where there is good lighting. It does get fuzzy picture when there is low-light conditions. Also, any touching of the actual cam while filming causes a very annoying sound. I suggest keeping it on a selfie stick or on an adapter of some kind while filming to avoid the annoying noise.
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: This little cam is awesome! Works well and is totally steady
customer_reviews.text: This little cam is awesome! Works well and is totally steady. The sound is fine as long as your not rushing around like on a motorcycle or car. The video is great and even the still pictures are nice. The wrist viewer is the BOMB! I love knowing what the image looks like while it's recording and being able to start and stop recording at will. A great alternative to the mighty GO PRO.
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: SONY AS100V Action Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the SJ4000 camera that broke on me (Thanks again to Amazon for the great return policy there). I've definitely put the Sony cameras though the paces as it's been used to take video during motorcycle trackdays, go karting, and street riding. I really like the GPS feature that I can use as a poor man's laptimer, or to relive the routes I've ridden. The Sony software is a little clunky, but useable. Full review and unboxing here:
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Best action cam out there
customer_reviews.text: Amazing action cam. I haven't had the chance to fully dive into it so I will post more when I get the chance. So far clarity has been great. A little noisy on the bike ride and a little bumpy on the turkey hunt but I'm impressed. View remote is surprisingly helpful. Lots of people said skip out on it but I say get it. Can't go wrong with being able to check and make sure you are getting the shot you want.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto G.

customer_reviews.title: Trust Sony
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Haven't used it for long but so far very happy with it. Quality of both video and audio is fantastic. The features are endless. NFC connection with phone works great. I don't think the remote is a must because you can use your phone as a remote with PlayMemories mobile app. The camera is user friendly. Menu is simple and easy to maneuver. It's a brilliant compact action cam by a well respected company. Sony is a trusted name specially when seeking good video/audio quality. Never had a GoPro but I'm happy I bought Sony's action cam. Once again I was proven that you can trust this company for top notch products.
customer_reviews.author: Mattan Biran

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale on clearance and I am super happy at the price, but may have been a little underwhelmed at full retail. Family has had a lot of fun playing with it skiing / beach / kayaking. Video is a little bit more "barreled" than I would like and there are lots of menu options to get through and fussy to change. Recommended additions: the flat front dive enclosure / add on float / control app
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam for cycling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to mount to a bike. The quality of the videos is superb and surpassed my expectations. I specifically wanted an action cam that included motion stabilization since this was being used on a fast-moving bicycle. We've had this camera for over a year now and have no complaints whatsoever. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST ACtion Cam
customer_reviews.text: Love the new splash proof case . I got this camera on gold box sale , makes it the best action camera on the market for the money. GPS feature is very neet. with the GPS overlay you get to see speed and location. easily worked with my smart phone for checking my View set up. and Now with this live stream thing you could in theory stream while synced to your phone and your friends and family could watch what you are doing any where.
customer_reviews.author: MrRideRed

customer_reviews.title: destroys gopros at a lower price point
customer_reviews.text: i would say its better in every way compared to a gopro. its less expensive comes with a sweet live view remote. it takes clear pics and video. the image stabilization is superior to that of the gopro. I get a lot of compliments on the video and pictures i capture with this. also people are really curious to see what it is and how it works.
customer_reviews.author: CristianG

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for "waterproof"
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for a trip to Greece. Thought it would be a safe bet seeing as though a lot of sand and water was going to be involved. Ended up dropping the camera in 30+ ft of water in the Aegean, left there for over 24 hours and still works like a charm. So impressed with this camera. Built well (and works well too). Loved all the pictures and videos that came off of the camera once I fished it out of the sea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this action cam
customer_reviews.text: I love this action cam. This is the second one I have bought. This one didn't come with a battery or the yellow mount clip. I was (and still am) quite disappointed. I knew that I didn't buy the model with the battery charger but not having a battery included seems odd. Make sure you know what you are buying when you buy from the Amazon deals. FYI I didn't buy a used model; it was new. The action cam itself is great. Just disappointed in the Amazon deals (amazon.com seller).
customer_reviews.author: l_monsoon_l

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty great little camera, but it does eat batteries. I haven't gotten any mounts for it, but the image stabilization is pretty great for free handing, and the quality of footage in the right setting with the right lighting is rather remarkable. There is some distortion due to how wide the lens is, but it's workable. The main issue is that it REALLY eats the batteries quick, and they do take some time to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Brett H. Pokorny

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this camera under water wasn't as good as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this camera under water wasn't as good as I was expecting. I used both this and the go pro on a coral reef and the go pro definitely out did this camera. Out side of water though it functions great, but I use these cameras half the time under water. Long story short I ended up selling mine and will be sticking with go pro for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera, just wish that Sony did something else ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera, just wish that Sony did something else with the lens cover on the case. Since its rounded, it is prone to getting scratched and damaged. Mine got a pretty good knick on the lens on the case (luckily outside your field of vision), but still I'm very happy with it, and its much better than what I got out of a similar priced Go-Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great little HD camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little HD camera. I bought this for my honeymoon. Video/pictures under water while snorkeling did not come out as crisp as I had hoped, though that is more like a result of water clarity. Menu interface is simple and easy to use. Difficult to use as a point and shoot based on its shape - difficult to square up a picture. Overall a worthy competitor in the 'GoPro' market.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Splash proof upgrade and new Pro mode!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this is the splash proof body. I have a AS-15 also and don't see a lot of major differences really. Both cams can be used in each others water proof cases that come shipped with the units. However, I do see image improvement when using the Pro mode on the100V. At 200 bucks, this is a very good buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Frank

customer_reviews.title: having a short battery life shooting at 1080p it will be nice to be able to charge at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Few things.. Seems to connect only with the cable it came with. To download to PC, it requires sony software, which is another step. Doesn't work and charge at the same time, having a short battery life shooting at 1080p it will be nice to be able to charge at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Soo S Chang

customer_reviews.title: Best hd camera I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Youtube channel:  I get constant messages about the quality of my videos. EVERYTHING is filmed on that channel with this camera. I will probably buy the next one when it comes out. Best hd camera I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: The positive is that the video from this camera is EXCELLENT. I am sure that it is as good a video as Go-Pro, or Contour. The editing is also easy with the play-memories software. The big knock on this camera is the GPS. I bought it for the GPS, and I'm very disappointed. It does not show accurate speed, and the display speed in a very notchy. Not usable at all. The GPS layout is also terrible. Very inaccurate, and the times that it does look about right, it can get out of sync with the video. Summary: Camera good, GPS garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S.

customer_reviews.title: perfect scuba camera, I like it better than my gopro
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as a gopro with lots of settings and options for different modes of recording. The menu takes a few minutes to understand but it is rather simple to navigate once you you get it. Stills are great, video quality is excellent for low light situations. I use it to record my scuba dives because it is a streamlined fit on my mask. Great camera, tremendous value, recommended buy!
customer_reviews.author: Travis B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great so far. case it comes with is only water resistant to 16ft. I haven't tested it. Video & sound quality is good, perhaps slightly less than the newest go pro but close enough given the price difference. I picked mine up on sale which made it a no brainer. Has a GPS which the same tier GoPro does not offer.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: A good action camera though
customer_reviews.text: I want to complain about the convenience about data transferring: If you use its wifi to transfer, it is very slow, and it could be easily fail for some kind of reason; the best way is to plug in the USB cable, but you will have to open the cap every time. I almost tore down and damaged the cap only for several times. Please develop a better solution on data transferring.
customer_reviews.author: Kee Tsui

customer_reviews.title: I liked this camera
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera. But I could not set it up to record while charging. Back it went. The vendor, Cameta Camera, was very cooperative and refunded me in full. I wanted to record while riding my motorcycle. After much research, I found the BikerHD camera, made specifically for...Bikers! Waiting for arrival now.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this great little action camera when it was on sale for $150. It has already recorded many hours of great video as well as done a lot of time lapse photography. The slow motion capabilities are fantastic as well. With a few extra batteries, I can take off for a few days and not worry about being near a charger. It's hard to imagine a better value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: runs for over an hour on its battery , live view via a wifi connection. great image quality. one note ; do NOT lose the paperwork thatcomes with it as the password for the wifi is written on it. there is no way to retrieve that password from the camera itself !
customer_reviews.author: vincent himpe

customer_reviews.title: Nice results, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Nice results, good battery life. I use it to record youth sporting and musical events on a tripod. My only gripe are the buttons are are bit difficult to push with my fat fingers. This makes menu scrolling a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene C. Nivera

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a camera! I did a lot of reading before deciding between this Sony camera and the leading competitor. I found 5 areas where the Sony was superior. The camera has proved more than I had suspected. A huge feature is the image stabilization which the other brand doesn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Geepa

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Killer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these because I didn't feel like spending the extra $120 on a GoPro Black Hero+. I am glad I didn't. I have used a GoPro before and this camera is better quality, has more features, and has better value (accessories included). Do yourself a favor and research what you want/need. Don't be biased buy advertisement budget. Pick a camera that works for you!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for an even better price!I
customer_reviews.text: use this with my GoPro and i have found myself using this more and more just because of how easy to turn on and capture the moment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Simple review! The camera is awesome! Easy to use and catches great pics and videos. The action watch you can ditch. The sony play memories app for your phone will work better! Overall AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Aguilar Fam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent image quality in a nice low profile form factor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent image quality in a nice low profile form factor. Decent battery life in the lower resolutions. The menu is clumsy and difficult to use. Lens is very exposed and will be the first thing damaged if you drop this without the case.
customer_reviews.author: grsn

customer_reviews.title: Great Actioncam
customer_reviews.text: The 1080p at 60 fps is really awesome and looks fantastic on my television! With the image stabilizer off, the view is at 170° which is like looking through a door peephole. Turning on the image stabilizer, the view is reduced to 120°. It works well with my Android phone and I can see what the camera is looking at. Since most people have smartphones, it's not really necessary to buy the live view remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: great cam!!! for holiday videos!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great cam, I am glad I bought this camera, the resolution is great (not compared to my dslr of course) and the size is excelent, I can use it with my smartphone. the quality is not great for underwater filming, but it is not its main activity. it focuses around 30 or 40 centimeters to far away, it would be nice for it to focus closer.
customer_reviews.author: ORLANDO GUZMAN

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera for the price. Video quality is fantastic. Battery lasts around 2 hours. I picked up a wasabi bat. kit for more flexibility. I had the AS20V, and love the onboard GPS and mount on this camera better. It's also nice that it is splashproof. This is a no brainer vs. buying a Hero 3 black.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S. Morris

customer_reviews.title: great product unless you are a fan of gopro and ...
customer_reviews.text: great product unless you are a fan of gopro and want to do like the rest - not me - I love it I am having a great time with it. carefull to the construction it is plastic and if it fall it will probably break.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre TinelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Tested the video at the highest settings at 50 Mbps XAVC S format and the video quality is amazing. I'm also using a 64 GB sony micro SDXC card and it transfer faster than the sandisk version. My only complaint about this camera is that damn bright red REC led indicator light on the top of the camera and it can't be turn off. I thought it was the GPS led indicator but after looking at the user manual it label as the REC light. Wish there was a way to turn this off it gets pretty annoying when you are recording in the dark, during the day is all good.
customer_reviews.author: Clvno

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Accident
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my cart and accidentally ordered it on my phone (guess 1-step order got turned on w/o my knowing). I kept it and discovered it is great. Very small and fantastic quality! We sold our older, larger cams.
customer_reviews.author: Cognizant Consumer

customer_reviews.title: and should be very good for action recording
customer_reviews.text: It's really small, and should be very good for action recording. But it does not have zoom in/out function like most other models, and it does not have monitoring device on the camera. You have to use other equipment, like cell phone or computer to monitor recording.
customer_reviews.author: S. Li

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. I took diving with me several times, the video quality (1080) is PERFECT! The colors (at shallow depths >7m) is very realistic and vibrant. I'm still trying to find a way to attach it to my board while kite surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Beco G.

customer_reviews.title: As a action cam newby I read all the reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: As a action cam newby I read all the reviews I could get my digital hands on & watched multiple video. The Sony AS100VR was the clear winner when compared to the latest GoPro. The software is intuitive and I'm currently working on using the Sony playmemories to manipulate my mountain biking movies. Read the professional reviews for serious and knowledgeable insites into the cameras capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Gary Vercoe

customer_reviews.title: Great camera that packs a beautiful picture view punch.
customer_reviews.text: Go Pro has now meet its match! This camera is awesome! Very simple to use, and light weight to put in your pocket. The picture quality is great, but it takes some getting use to the 190 degree angled lens.
customer_reviews.author: E. GRANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: The actual camera is quite nice.
customer_reviews.text: The mount location is the big downfall on this. I can't get it mounted in a reasonable way on a bike without getting massive vibration. Placing the mount at the center would go a long way. The actual camera is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job wonderfully, but low battery life hinders it
customer_reviews.text: Does the job wonderfully, but low battery life hinders it. I'd give it 4 stars otherwise. I'd still buy the same product again looking back, but with an additional battery. Pros: - Amazing image stabilization - Super wide lens, able to catch a lot of action - Good quality video - Generic tripod mount allows you to hook it up to whatever suction cup/assorted mounts you already have. Cons: - Battery lasted but 45 mins for me in one particular outing -- definitely need to pick up an extra battery or two if you want to use this for medium length production - Can only charge it while it's off
customer_reviews.author: karmic joke

customer_reviews.title: Makes huge file images 4MB+ good quality. Wi-Fi connects and plays on iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Go-Pro-Brother - just made in SONY(China). Works as expected. Makes huge file images 4MB+ good quality. Wi-Fi connects and plays on iPhone, iPad and Sony TV. Submerged under water, still works and records. Another wonderful SONY product. Buy a bigger SD card - you will need it.
customer_reviews.author: George Rindov

customer_reviews.title: Image is fantastic. Very smooth and steady
customer_reviews.text: I use in car while racing. Image is fantastic. Very smooth and steady. No more motion sickness watching videos. Sony AKASF1 skeleton case makes usb power cord attachment easy. Also can remove camera quickly without upsetting roll bar mount position.Sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Doug N

customer_reviews.title: Takes awesome pictures and very vivid color
customer_reviews.text: Takes awesome pictures and very vivid color. Could not get the streaming to work but that is a bit over kill anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Vancraw

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, and it was such a great value when ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, and it was such a great value when I bought it. Cannot imagine paying almost double for GoPro after that. Does everything I want, everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy Krasnikov

customer_reviews.title: Better than Go Pro.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do. Fabulous videos in a variety of places. Wide angle. Slow motion. Great color. Better than GO PRO!!
customer_reviews.author: californiajoe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: focus isnt that great or sharp. low light is poor
customer_reviews.author: Z. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: We love this camera
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera. We took it on a 2 week motorbike ride and had it attached to the handle bars (Bought the adaptor separately)
customer_reviews.author: Lily Lakeland

customer_reviews.title: Get the dog mount too, it's a blast
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I really like the wrist remote setup, and the videos so far have been great - excellent resolution, good image stabilization.
customer_reviews.author: T.W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: the BEST camera you will ever buy!!
customer_reviews.text: love this camera!!! captures every moment, action and sound perfect!! it is my favorite little devive, is sTHE BEST CAMERA OUT THERE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Almonte

customer_reviews.title: great tool for a videographer
customer_reviews.text: Extremely please with image quality in Video and Photos, work as expected, great tool for a videographer, now part of my carry everywhere cams don't leave home without it
customer_reviews.author: Dr Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than a go pro and has a better image and features. Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L. Tjernagel

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Gopro that costs less.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool device. Excellent image stabilization. Excellent image quality. Good audio quality when outside of protective housing. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TX MaleTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Lacks in attachments and software is subpar. However, excellent video quality and image stabilization is superior. Main use is Mt biking.
customer_reviews.author: Hibby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good to grip and easy to transfer. i recommand
customer_reviews.author: Lee min-je

customer_reviews.title: Great action camera
customer_reviews.text: Great action camera! I love everything about this little cam BUT the only thing that I don't really like is the photo option: the picture(s) taken are in 170° which gives it a warped look. It isn't very bad but it makes the pictures look a bit funky, BUT the picture are super clear and sharp; great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Lee

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Works well with waterproof cover in the ocean, on my motorcycle, sports events
customer_reviews.author: aynsley howard

customer_reviews.title: WOrks great for capturing golf swings
customer_reviews.text: We are using this to video golf swings. Works great, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best option
customer_reviews.text: Best action cam ever amazing pictures videos great battery has a good shape very aerodinamic for me is same or better than go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco S.

customer_reviews.title: sony !!
customer_reviews.text: loved the stabilizer the video quality is awesome i tried the go pro and the sony i would say i loved the sony
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Alrasasi

customer_reviews.title: the software is terrible and many of the features I bought it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Typical of Sony, the software is terrible and many of the features I bought it for are non-existent without using their software, like GPS and Live Streaming. Charging is fiddly and after having it plugged in all night, I found it completely dead the next morning. Onboard interface is okay once you get used to it, but lots of modes to toggle through, so you have to be patient. I like the size, feather-weight, and styling--much better than the other guys on the Industrial Design front. I'm also disappointed at the underwater quality due to the case. Consensus seems to be that flat-lens cases are better, but I can't find one for this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gielow

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It makes some nice pictures for things nearby. Know that there is no zoom, and no built in view finder. So you must use your phone with app, which is pretty handy. Has a fisheye look to a lot of shots due to wide angle. But for the price and the right uses, this will make you very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rose

customer_reviews.title: Its a SONY! Mostly used under water with box ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a SONY ! Mostly used under water with box MPKAS3, 20m deep no leaks. Don't use default box (5m deep only) or you will kill your camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander_Ag

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good... nothing to envy the go pros but the mounts... regarding video and photo quality, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you crash your motorcycle and can't remember what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome action cam, great quality vide and perfect compact size! alot better than Gopro!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over the AS15
customer_reviews.text: Photo quality and video quality far superior to hero 3+. Digital stabilization works a treat but the fact you can now use this device without being in the case but still have ability to attach to tripod, is splashproof , superb audio quality and can attach just the optional lens protector sold it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Iain R Frew

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: I sold my gopro hero3 months ago and when the hero 3+ went out i wanted to get it but now sony got as100 so i always wanted to give the sony action cams a try , It is the best action camera i have ever used, i wont say much more than other 5 stars review did.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar Shiref Alawadi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Only complaint is u can't turn camera on/off with the wrist cam
customer_reviews.author: texags_99

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but horrible horrible battery..I used it to take 8 photos and the battery was drained....junk batteries
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wish the photos and video weren't so grainy
customer_reviews.text: It works so well, the battery life is about 4 hours (I think), and it looks really cool. I wish the picture and video quality were a little better. It's a bit grainy and I wasn't totally expecting that. But you get what you pay for with cameras. If you want something close to being HD, go with the Sony HDRAS 200 or higher. I've used this Wasabi power battery pack and charger and the batteries work and charge with two extras since the camera came with one.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: So small but so useful for making your new memory
customer_reviews.text: So small but so useful for making your new memory.
customer_reviews.author: Heewoo Park

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great, sound quality is decent but battery not so great
customer_reviews.text: Took this thing out for a test run chasing my 4 nephews at the playground. The live view remote is very convenience to allow you to frame your shot but the camera lens is very wide so without a live view remote you can pretty much get everything intended in view. The battery life on the remote is great but the battery life on the camera is not. I spent about 2 hours at the playground and used the remote to start/stop the camera quite often, The battery indicator on the remote still had about 60% after about 2 hours of shooting however the battery one the camera was completely drained. Extended battery is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppy Burpday

customer_reviews.title: So I'd like to recommend it to people around holding the heart
customer_reviews.text: Product well received. So I'd like to recommend it to people around holding the heart. Then I will buy again. Thank you.

customer_reviews.text: Very cool! Packed full of features.. Recently purchased the Sony a6000 and was floored to find out the live view remote in the kit, works flawlessly with the it. HOW COOL IS THAT!?

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the fancy brand GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Just OK. Just as good as the fancy brand GoPro. Requires fast SD card for the fastest new codec. The interface requires lots of button pushing and looking a a tiny screen. They already have a newer model that is the same only smaller and lighter

product_meta.title: Sony HDRAS100V/W Video Camera (White)
product_meta.description:
Style:HDRAS100V/W| Configuration:BaseStep it up with the Action Cam that brings pro-quality features along for the ride. Keep things smooth with Advanced Steady Shot and enjoy the convenience of built-in Wi-Fi with remote viewing and control from your mobile device. All in a housing-free, splash-proof body that packs XAVC S HD recording and high frame rates in 120/240p. It"s ready for the big time, are you?

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 







Step it up with the Action Cam that packs pro-quality features like Advanced Steady Shot, built-in Wi-Fi, and XAVC S HD recording and 120/240p frame rates into a splash-proof body. With a built-in tripod mount and GPS tagging, it's ready for the big waves, the big air and the big jumps. The real question is, are you? 




TECHNOLOGY


STAY SHARP WITH STEADYSHOT
Conquer jagged mountain peaks, rocketing descents or swerving slaloms in perfect clarity thanks to SteadyShot image stabilization with Active Mode that delivers stunningly smooth video even while in motion. In addition, innovative 3-way shake canceling adds electronic roll stability for even smoother video capture.

WEATHER WARRIOR
Keep focused on the footage and not the conditions thanks to a splash-proof body that takes the worry out of weather, even when your Action Cam is outside its included housing. Need to take a breather or set up a static shot? Simply attach a tripod via the universal tripod screw mount and keep capturing all the action in sublime stability.

MAKE EVERY SHOT COUNT
Turn your compatible smartphone or tablet into a mobile, remote viewfinder and make adjustments to camera settings on the fly, even when your road takes you off the beaten path. With Wi-Fi and Near Field Communication (NFC), you can frame your shot perfectly before you step off into your next adventure and instantly share it with your friends to up the ante on the next trick or trail. And now you can now control up to 5 Action Cams (HDR-AS100V) at the same time using the optional LiveView Remote1.




SHOOT LIKE A PRO
Capture quick action with smooth image motion pro-quality XAVC S recording with 50Mbps high bit rate data transfer. HDR-AS100V also supports 24p high-speed 120 fps and 240 fps shooting with sound, as well as MP4 HD video for when you just have to share your latest trick and turn across the Internet.

TRACK YOUR TRAIL
Use the built-in GPS with the free PlayMemories Home software to track your speed and performance. Location, trail and speed information add more layers to your ability to analyze your performance that can be captured and displayed on your video.

SERIOUS STEREO SOUND
Can you imagine skydiving without hearing the rush of air past your ears, or catching the perfect wave without the crash of the surf? Now you don't have to. Record the splashes, the shouts, and the swooshes in glorious stereo with Action Cam so you can relive your experiences in the detail they deserve.







ADDITIONAL FEATURES

EXMOR R CMOS SENSOR FOR SUPERB LOW LIGHT SHOOTING

Experience stunning low-light sensitivity with improved image clarity and drastically reduced grain with Sony's back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS sensor.

ULTRA WIDE 170° PRO QUALITY CARL ZEISS VARIO-TESSAR LENS
With an ultra-wide angle Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens, you will increase your perspective (170-degree viewing angle) while you venture out on breathtaking views of dynamic terrain to include ski slopes and mountain trails.

CAPTURE HIGH QUALITY 13.5MP STILL IMAGES IN PHOTO MODE
Put your HDR-AS100V in still image mode and capture amazing high quality 13.5MP still images with a single press of the button.




MEMORY STICK MICRO AND MICRO SD/SDHC COMPATIBLE

Expandable memory with Memory Stick Micro and Micro SD/SDHC card slot.

HDMI OUTPUT FOR EASY FILE TRANSFER

With HDMI output, you'll be able to share your Sony HDR-AS100V video with friends and family on your HDTV (HDMI cable required/not included).




RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES

UNIVERSAL HEAD MOUNT BLT-UMHI HANDLEBAR MOUNT VCT-HM1 SUCTION CUP MOUNT PF-VCT-SC1 WRIST MOUNT AKA-WM1 KAYAK/SURF BOARD MOUNT AKA-SM1 MULTIPOD VCT-AMP1 BALL HEAD MOUNT ADP-BH1 CHEST MOUNT AKA-CMH1 DOG HARNESS AKA-DM1 LCD UNIT AKA-LUI LIVE-VIEW REMOTE M-LVR1 SNOW
√ √ √ √ √ √ BIKE
√ √ √ √ PET

√ √ √ √ √ √ √ SPECTATOR/PLAYBACK

1. Requires NFC-compatible mobile device. Check device's user manual for compatibility. Device cases may prevent connection. Live View Remote is an optional purchase.

2. Live-View Remote (RM-LV1) included with bundle package.

3. Supplied housing Waterproof down to 3meters (15feet).
